GlitchLogicItems.name: Advanced Platforming
GlitchLogicItems.tooltip: Platforming techniques that don't require any glitches but might be too tough for some players.

GlitchLogicItems.name: B Locker Skips
GlitchLogicItems.tooltip: Any skip that allows you to bypass the B. Locker's requirements.

GlitchLogicItems.name: General Clips
GlitchLogicItems.tooltip: Any trick that doesn't fall into a general category. Includes object clips, bush push, terminal 2 clip and Crypt jump clip.

GlitchLogicItems.name: Ledge Clips
GlitchLogicItems.tooltip: A trick that allows the player to fall through gaps between walls and floors.

GlitchLogicItems.name: Moonkicks
GlitchLogicItems.tooltip: A trick that allows Donkey to ascend by interrupting his aerial attack with a kick.

GlitchLogicItems.name: Moontail
GlitchLogicItems.tooltip: A trick that allows the player to gain extra height with Diddy.

GlitchLogicItems.name: Phase Swimming
GlitchLogicItems.tooltip: Formerly known as STVW, a trick to go through a significant amount of walls in the game whilst underwater.

GlitchLogicItems.name: Phase Walking
GlitchLogicItems.tooltip: A triple-frame perfect technique to go through a significant amount of walls in the game. This option also includes Phase Falling.

GlitchLogicItems.name: Skew
GlitchLogicItems.tooltip: A trick that enables you to rotate the kong's collision and model, enabling the player to go through most walls in the game.

GlitchLogicItems.name: Spawn Snags
GlitchLogicItems.tooltip: A trick that allows you to collect items earlier than intended by keeping them unloaded. Only accounts for spawn snags that have been done by humans.

GlitchLogicItems.name: Swim through Shores
GlitchLogicItems.tooltip: A trick that allows you to swim into a sloped shoreline to get out of bounds.

GlitchLogicItems.name: Tag Barrel Storage
GlitchLogicItems.tooltip: A trick that allows you to store a tag barrel being entered and abuse that storage. Includes telegrabs and Orangstand TBS Noclips.

GlitchLogicItems.name: Troff n Scoff Skips
GlitchLogicItems.tooltip: Any skip that allows you to bypass the kong and small banana requirement in order to fight a boss.
